item.title: A few of the learnings from my 10+ years of software programming experience
item.description: After being in this industry for more than a decade now, there are a huge set of learnings that I have gathered. From programming microprocessors in assembly language on a dedicated hardware programmer to working with on petabyte scale data pipelines, I have gained experience with many different paradigms of programming world. Also, from working in a small one-room startup to a global conglomerate, to starting my own, I have also experienced many different organizational aspects and how they shape the entire software development process.

item.title: Using Gitlab's free private repo and CI/CD to deploy a static site to Github Pages for free
item.description: Have you ever desired to host your own personal blog, or a website to showcase your work, for free? All this while taking advantage of a globally distributed CDN to speed up the site’s delivery to your visitors? Github Pages gives us exactly that!! It give us the ability to host static content (blog/website) for free. We can use that to showcase our work, highlight our achievements, share our resume, setup our personal blog, etc.
